languages.text: "Анализ субстанции завершен. Прогноз... пессимистичный. Рекомендуется заранее авторизовать уполномоченных единиц на поиск подходящего преемника".
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."
languages.original_text: "Анализ субстанции завершен. Прогноз... пессимистичный. Рекомендуется заранее авторизовать уполномоченных единиц на поиск подходящего преемника".

traits.locale_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is… pessimistic. It is recommended that you authorize the designated units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is… pessimistic. It is recommended that you authorize the designated units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is… dim. It is recommended that you authorise the designated units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is… dim. It is recommended that you authorise the designated units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."
"Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

languages.text: "Substanzanalyse abgeschlossen. Die Aussichten sind ... düster. Es wird empfohlen, dass ihr autorisierte Einheiten mit der Suche nach einem angemessenen Nachfolger betraut."
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

traits.locale_text: "Substanzanalyse abgeschlossen. Die Aussichten sind ... düster. Es wird empfohlen, dass ihr autorisierte Einheiten mit der Suche nach einem angemessenen Nachfolger betraut."

languages.text: « Analyse de la substance terminée. Le résultat est... préoccupant. L'envoi immédiat d'unités chargées de vous trouver un successeur adéquat est recommandé. »
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

traits.locale_text: « Analyse de la substance terminée. Le résultat est... préoccupant. L'envoi immédiat d'unités chargées de vous trouver un successeur adéquat est recommandé. »

languages.text: «Análisis de la sustancia completado. La perspectiva es... poco halagüeña. Recomiendo enviar unidades autorizadas para localizar a un sucesor apropiado».
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

traits.locale_text: «Análisis de la sustancia completado. La perspectiva es... poco halagüeña. Recomiendo enviar unidades autorizadas para localizar a un sucesor apropiado».

languages.text: 「物質分析完了。見通しは…暗い。適切な後継者を捜索するべく、権限を持つ部隊の派遣を推奨します」
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

traits.locale_text: 「物質分析完了。見通しは…暗い。適切な後継者を捜索するべく、権限を持つ部隊の派遣を推奨します」

languages.text: “物质分析完成，前景……非常黯淡。建议派遣授权单位，寻找能继承授状的下一位继任者。”
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."

traits.locale_text: “物质分析完成，前景……非常黯淡。建议派遣授权单位，寻找能继承授状的下一位继任者。”

languages.text: "Madde analizi tamamlandı. Görünümü... Bulanık. Uygun bir halef bulmaları için yetkili birimleri sevk etmeniz önerilmekte."
languages.original_text: "Substance analysis complete. The outlook is... dim. It is recommended that you dispatch authorised units to locate an appropriate successor."
